definitions: in a way that relates to the observation and treatment of actual patients rather than theoretical or laboratory studies

examples.text: the product would be developed and clinically tested in Denmark

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to observation and treatment of actual patients rather than theoretical or laboratory studies

definitions: in a way that causes observable and recognizable symptoms

examples.text: this is manifested clinically as a heart attack
he has been diagnosed as clinically depressed

shortDefinitions: in way that causes observable and recognizable symptoms

definitions: in a very efficient and detached way

examples.text: they calmly and clinically documented the ongoing destruction
they used murder as a cold-blooded and clinically calculated means to a political end

shortDefinitions: in very efficient and detached way

definitions: in a bare, functional, and clean way

examples.text: the clinically clean kitchen design is curiously devoid of atmosphere
